Observed at: White Rock 2:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the water overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of thunderstorms. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 near noon then southeast 30 late in the afternoon except gusting to 50 near the water. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
